grant_scavenging_reward = {
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = scavenging_reward_infantry_tech_category }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName] Granting scavenging reward - 1x 50% tech boost for infantry_tech_category..."
		}
		add_tech_bonus = {
			bonus = 0.5
			uses = 1
			category = infantry_tech_category
		}
		clr_country_flag = scavenging_reward_infantry_tech_category
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = scavenging_reward_support_tech_category }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName] Granting scavenging reward - 1x 50% tech boost for support_tech..."
		}
		add_tech_bonus = {
			bonus = 0.5
			uses = 1
			category = support_tech
		}
		clr_country_flag = scavenging_reward_support_tech_category
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = scavenging_reward_spec_force_tech_category }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName] Granting scavenging reward - 1x 50% tech boost for special_force_tech..."
		}
		add_tech_bonus = {
			bonus = 0.5
			uses = 1
			category = special_force_tech
		}
		clr_country_flag = scavenging_reward_spec_force_tech_category
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = scavenging_reward_vehicle_tech_category }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName] Granting scavenging reward - 1x 50% tech boost for vehicle_tech..."
		}
		add_tech_bonus = {
			bonus = 0.5
			uses = 1
			category = vehicle_tech
		}
		clr_country_flag = scavenging_reward_vehicle_tech_category
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = scavenging_reward_air_tech_category }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName] Granting scavenging reward - 1x 50% tech boost for air_tech..."
		}
		add_tech_bonus = {
			bonus = 0.5
			uses = 1
			category = air_tech
		}
		clr_country_flag = scavenging_reward_air_tech_category
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = scavenging_reward_naval_tech_category }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName] Granting scavenging reward - 1x 50% tech boost for naval_tech..."
		}
		add_tech_bonus = {
			bonus = 0.5
			uses = 1
			category = naval_tech
		}
		clr_country_flag = scavenging_reward_naval_tech_category
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = scavenging_reward_cat_land_doctrine }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName] Granting scavenging reward - 1x 50% tech boost for land_doctrine..."
		}
		add_tech_bonus = {
			bonus = 0.5
			uses = 1
			category = land_doctrine
		}
		clr_country_flag = scavenging_reward_cat_land_doctrine
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = scavenging_reward_cat_naval_doctrine }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName] Granting scavenging reward - 1x 50% tech boost for naval_doctrine..."
		}
		add_tech_bonus = {
			bonus = 0.5
			uses = 1
			category = naval_doctrine
		}
		clr_country_flag = scavenging_reward_cat_naval_doctrine
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = scavenging_reward_industry }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName] Granting scavenging reward - 1x 50% tech boost for industry..."
		}
		add_tech_bonus = {
			bonus = 0.5
			uses = 1
			category = industry
		}
		clr_country_flag = scavenging_reward_industry
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = scavenging_reward_electronics }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName] Granting scavenging reward - 1x 50% tech boost for electronics..."
		}
		add_tech_bonus = {
			bonus = 0.5
			uses = 1
			category = electronics
		}
		clr_country_flag = scavenging_reward_electronics
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = scavenging_reward_robotics_tech_category }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName] Granting scavenging reward - 1x 50% tech boost for robotics_tech..."
		}
		add_tech_bonus = {
			bonus = 0.5
			uses = 1
			category = robotics_tech
		}
		clr_country_flag = scavenging_reward_robotics_tech_category
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = scavenging_reward_scavenging_old_world_computer }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName] Granting scavenging reward - idea scavenging_old_world_computer for 180 days..."
		}
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = scavenging_old_world_computer
			days = 180
		}
		clr_country_flag = scavenging_reward_scavenging_old_world_computer
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = scavenging_reward_scavenging_old_world_tactics }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName] Granting scavenging reward - idea scavenging_old_world_tactics for 180 days..."
		}
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = scavenging_old_world_tactics
			days = 180
		}
		clr_country_flag = scavenging_reward_scavenging_old_world_tactics
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = scavenging_reward_scavenging_old_world_loudspeakers }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName] Granting scavenging reward - idea scavenging_old_world_loudspeakers for 180 days..."
		}
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = scavenging_old_world_loudspeakers
			days = 180
		}
		clr_country_flag = scavenging_reward_scavenging_old_world_loudspeakers
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = scavenging_reward_scavenging_old_world_spybook }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName] Granting scavenging reward - idea scavenging_old_world_spybook for 180 days..."
		}
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = scavenging_old_world_spybook
			days = 180
		}
		clr_country_flag = scavenging_reward_scavenging_old_world_spybook
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = scavenging_reward_scavenging_old_world_weapon_schematics }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName] Granting scavenging reward - idea scavenging_old_world_weapon_schematics for 180 days..."
		}
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = scavenging_old_world_weapon_schematics
			days = 180
		}
		clr_country_flag = scavenging_reward_scavenging_old_world_weapon_schematics
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = scavenging_reward_scavenging_old_world_factory_schematics }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName] Granting scavenging reward - idea scavenging_old_world_factory_schematics for 180 days..."
		}
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = scavenging_old_world_factory_schematics
			days = 180
		}
		clr_country_flag = scavenging_reward_scavenging_old_world_factory_schematics
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = scavenging_reward_scavenging_old_world_naval_targeting_system }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName] Granting scavenging reward - idea scavenging_old_world_naval_targeting_system for 180 days..."
		}
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = scavenging_old_world_naval_targeting_system
			days = 180
		}
		clr_country_flag = scavenging_reward_scavenging_old_world_naval_targeting_system
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = scavenging_reward_scavenging_old_world_radar_system }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName] Granting scavenging reward - idea scavenging_old_world_radar_system for 180 days..."
		}
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = scavenging_old_world_radar_system
			days = 180
		}
		clr_country_flag = scavenging_reward_scavenging_old_world_radar_system
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = scavenging_reward_scavenging_old_world_planning_system }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName] Granting scavenging reward - idea scavenging_old_world_planning_system for 180 days..."
		}
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = scavenging_old_world_planning_system
			days = 180
		}
		clr_country_flag = scavenging_reward_scavenging_old_world_planning_system
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = scavenging_reward_scavenging_old_world_political_guide }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName] Granting scavenging reward - idea scavenging_old_world_political_guide for 180 days..."
		}
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = scavenging_old_world_political_guide
			days = 180
		}
		clr_country_flag = scavenging_reward_scavenging_old_world_political_guide
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = scavenging_reward_general_atomics_unlock_tech }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName] Granting scavenging reward - tech general_atomics_unlock_tech..."
		}
		set_technology = {
			general_atomics_unlock_tech = 1
		}
		clr_country_flag = scavenging_reward_general_atomics_unlock_tech
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = scavenging_reward_stent_security_solutions_unlock_tech }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName] Granting scavenging reward - tech stent_security_solutions_unlock_tech..."
		}
		set_technology = {
			stent_security_solutions_unlock_tech = 1
		}
		clr_country_flag = scavenging_reward_stent_security_solutions_unlock_tech
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = scavenging_reward_wattz_company_unlock_tech }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName] Granting scavenging reward - tech wattz_company_unlock_tech..."
		}
		set_technology = {
			wattz_company_unlock_tech = 1
		}
		clr_country_flag = scavenging_reward_wattz_company_unlock_tech
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = scavenging_reward_handhtools_unlock_tech }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName] Granting scavenging reward - tech handhtools_unlock_tech..."
		}
		set_technology = {
			handhtools_unlock_tech = 1
		}
		clr_country_flag = scavenging_reward_handhtools_unlock_tech
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = scavenging_reward_poseidon_unlock_tech }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName] Granting scavenging reward - tech poseidon_unlock_tech..."
		}
		set_technology = {
			poseidon_unlock_tech = 1
		}
		clr_country_flag = scavenging_reward_poseidon_unlock_tech
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = scavenging_reward_lockreed_unlock_tech }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName] Granting scavenging reward - tech lockreed_unlock_tech..."
		}
		set_technology = {
			lockreed_unlock_tech = 1
		}
		clr_country_flag = scavenging_reward_lockreed_unlock_tech
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = scavenging_reward_arcjetsystems_unlock_tech }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName] Granting scavenging reward - tech arcjetsystems_unlock_tech..."
		}
		set_technology = {
			arcjetsystems_unlock_tech = 1
		}
		clr_country_flag = scavenging_reward_arcjetsystems_unlock_tech
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = scavenging_reward_westtek_unlock_tech }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName] Granting scavenging reward - tech westtek_unlock_tech..."
		}
		set_technology = {
			westtek_unlock_tech = 1
		}
		clr_country_flag = scavenging_reward_westtek_unlock_tech
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = scavenging_reward_robco_unlock_tech }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName] Granting scavenging reward - tech robco_unlock_tech..."
		}
		set_technology = {
			robco_unlock_tech = 1
		}
		clr_country_flag = scavenging_reward_robco_unlock_tech
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = scavenging_reward_plasma_unlock_tech }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName] Granting scavenging reward - tech plasma_unlock_tech..."
		}
		set_technology = {
			plasma_unlock_tech = 1
		}
		clr_country_flag = scavenging_reward_plasma_unlock_tech
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = scavenging_reward_gauss_unlock_tech }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName] Granting scavenging reward - tech gauss_unlock_tech..."
		}
		set_technology = {
			gauss_unlock_tech = 1
		}
		clr_country_flag = scavenging_reward_gauss_unlock_tech
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = scavenging_reward_vertibird_unlock_tech }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName] Granting scavenging reward - tech vertibird_unlock_tech..."
		}
		set_technology = {
			vertibird_unlock_tech = 1
		}
		clr_country_flag = scavenging_reward_vertibird_unlock_tech
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = scavenging_reward_geck }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName] Granting scavenging reward - 1 G.E.C.K.!"
		}
		set_country_flag = scavenged_geck_awarded
		custom_effect_tooltip = generic_geck_tt
		add_to_variable = { geck_count = 1 }
		clr_country_flag = scavenging_reward_geck
	}
}
# vim: set ft=pdx ts=2 sw=2 tw=79 :
